column1: Jeremy Roger Hansen, CD (born January 27, 1976) is a Canadian astronaut with the Canadian Space Agency (CSA).
He was selected to join the CSA in the 2009 CSA selection along with David Saint-Jacques.
He has since been promoted to the rank of Major.
Major Hansen is married with three children.
Hansen holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Space Science (First Class Honours) from Royal Military College in Kingston, Ontario (1999).
He earned a Master of Science in Physics from the same institution in 2000, with a research focus on Wide Field of View Satellite Tracking.
